price: Aane, Nyankopͻn ne mo Kyitaafoͻ, na Ɔne Ɔboafoͻ papa a Ɔkyεn aboafoͻ nyinaa.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
